title: Mystery Wards
body: Hey guys, has anyone been able to purchase mystery wards? Been looking at the store for a few times and cannot seem to find it. Any clues?

replies.body:
Hey guys, sorry about this.

As per the update on the [sales page](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/mystery-wards-are-back): There was an issue with Mystery Wards not being available for purchase as planned, so we're extending their availability until August 16 at 17:29PM AEST.

Bought one. Got DragonSlayer Poro Ward. Happy with it. Not going to test my luck.

In other news, it's been nearly a week since Patch 5.15 was released and the Chromas are still Unavailable? Why the release delay on Shop Content?

As far as I'm able to tell, the Chromas are not scheduled to be released yet. They should be released later on this patch cycle. I can only guess that they are still evaluating and tweaking the quality of the skins.
Cool. Really looking forward to the DragonSlayer Vayne Chroma.
I think it's not available because Wards Skins are disabled in champ select. It looks like an Oce thing only.
Yeah, I've also been looking for them. There not in the normal shop or the gifting center so i don't know whats going on. {{item:3340}}
Its not there. its usually the first option under ward skins tab.
